channel.title: -NLVL VPS HOSTING IS HORRIBLE THEY GG'D ME PLEASE READ- Updated
channel.description:
[i][b]So on the 14th of july, i had purchased a vps bronze package from nlvl.net.
He knows he messed up he tried offering me a 6gb vps package free for 6 months or a 50-100$ compensation...
Request: Send me my password. Outcome: VPS Operating System Re-Installed And All of my Server Files Deleted.
Wtf.... I worked on this source offline for about 8 months all day, all night, 2-3 days straight sometimes. I submit a password request, and they delete all my files, say they'll send me my password... forget to do it..
Everything was going fine than i released i was having all my players dc, there was major lagg, half the time i couldn't connect to the viewer.php to even connect to the vps itself.
So.. I submitted this ticket first:[/b][/i] [code]Hi, i downloaded a virus attempting to get a gaming server running ended up deleting 2 user accounts on my computer and wiping out my files in attempt to clean up my pc and speed it up not knowing i didn't have the desktop file "vps info" i had copied out of the email you guys sent me with all the vps info.
Email is techaneena69@yahoo.com
Please, help ALSO!!!!!!!!!
MAYBE you guys can help me half the time i can't even connect to the vps.. Daily the server disconnects (whichs kicks all my players on my game offline = loose items = refund ON DONATIONS) this is a on-going issue, all im running is a java.exe process. Please help... I feel like i got involved with a shitty vps here.[/code]
[i][b]Andrew V (NLVL STAFF) Replied:[/b][/i] [code]Gabriel,
Your VPS is a bronze VPS with only 512MB RAM with CPU limitations, we highly suggest that you upgrade. Also I will have to escalate this ticket to technical staff for them to get your VNC details
Thanks,
Andrew V Chief Marketing Officer & General Support[/code]
[i][b]ALL he told me there was some details about my vps plan, and suggested that i should upgrade, he than followed up by saying"I will escelate this ticket to get your VNC (VPS Connect) Details.
I replied with 2 more tickets:
First Ticket Submit:[/b][/i] [code]Do you know how long this is going to take, at the moment i have alot of players attempting to connect. Once my password is back ill go in and remove my services with you guys stop the funds, and than upgrade. I now understand the lagg i had a computer our in spanaway with about 512mb ram i didn't know that i will upgrade soon! In the meantime i need mah password.[/code]
[i][b]Second Ticket Submit:[/b][/i] [code]Still waiting for a reply, ill submit more tickets, i don't think this should take more than a day to lookup my password. Very urgent people are now leaving, asking about refunds. Please bump this and give me my VPS viewer connect password as soon as possible.[/code]
[i][b]Simply implying that I WILL upgrade my vps if needed. And please return me my password. (long story short i lost it on my hard drive during a cleanup)[/b][/i]
Their next reply to my password request was: (Now.. where in my speaches did i ask "please re-install my vps operating system?") [code]Gabriel,
Your VPS is currently being re-installed, I will have your account information emailed out to you within 30 mins - 1 hour.
Thanks,
Andrew V Chief Marketing Officer & General Support[/code]
[i][b]My reply to that was:[/b][/i] [code]If i loose my files in the transition or what ever it is you're doing. I'm going to be pissed guys seriously, i don't know if it even involves than but im just mentioning it.[/code]
[i][b](NONE OF THIS IS EDITED ALL I DID WAS SIMPLY SPACE OUT THE MESSAGES AND REMOVE MY PERSONAL INFO)[/b][/i] (sorry for the link tried submitting it on the post said a max of 2k characters..) [url=http://elitedemons.org/nlvlchatscript.php]http://elitedemons.org/nlvlchatscript.php[/url]
Please read all this and tell me who is right in this situation, everywhere i'm seeing nlvl is good, now im doing negative research ad finding out that they're not as professional as they appear, things don't work on their website, they respond totally off topic with out the info you asked for, all they do is copy and paste you their t.o.s Please read.

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:11, topic:409656”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=510930.msg3708155#msg3708155 date=1313177932]
Was that the VPS that you ‘gave’ me then took back when I had my files on there?

If so, then yes. I deleted your RSPS, asshole. Banned all my members in my chat…?
[/quote]

Who are you even talking to Fridder??

And no, at the moment their saying that i have three options on this happening.
Their saying that they can try searching around for my files.
Or, they can give me a large Compensation.
OR, they can give me a 6 month free vps with 6GB Ram…

So no, at the moment i am not being payed back for the source code i lost during this.
If we could keep this thread active to let people know about their services that would be great, searching around last night i found out that a couple people have been starting threads on NLVL and their service.

This thread is simply saying their service is horrible.
(NOT RECOMMENDED)[/quote]

I was talking to you… apparently your not that guy.
Did your VPS’s IP start with 184.22. …?

Read full topic

item.title: -NLVL VPS HOSTING IS HORRIBLE THEY GG'D ME PLEASE READ- Updated
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:3, topic:409656”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=510930.msg3707700#msg3707700 date=1313136988]
If after 8 months of hosting you didn’t make one backup on your own computer I can only assume you didn’t know enough about coding for it to be worth saving.
[/quote]

Well if you maybe read through the chat chanscript…
I had gotten a virus from some kid on here releasing “Ultimo 508” Go search it it’s a virus as a jar.exe
“Run and Compile GUI.exe”
And it started bugging me, spamming me with popups to install/run “Install-0.exe”

So i removed the user account it was on… = the user account with my server files.[/quote]
So that means that your complaining to us that you were stupid enough to delete a user account storing data without a thought as to what it may contain and then expected customer service to fix it and bring it back while your paying for a 512MB vps that is probably $10 a month. I’m not intending to troll but it’s just rather silly to post something like this, its not the hosts fault.

Read full topic

item.title: -NLVL VPS HOSTING IS HORRIBLE THEY GG'D ME PLEASE READ- Updated
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

[i][b]So on the 14th of july, i had purchased a vps bronze package from nlvl.net.

He knows he messed up he tried offering me a 6gb vps package free for 6 months or a 50-100$ compensation…

Request: Send me my password.
Outcome: VPS Operating System Re-Installed And All of my Server Files Deleted.

Wtf…
I worked on this source offline for about 8 months all day, all night, 2-3 days straight sometimes.
I submit a password request, and they delete all my files, say they’ll send me my password… forget to do it…

Everything was going fine than i released i was having all my players dc, there was major lagg, half the time i couldn’t connect to the viewer.php to even connect to the vps itself.

So…
I submitted this ticket first:[/b][/i]

[code]Hi, i downloaded a virus attempting to get a gaming server running ended up deleting 2 user accounts on my computer and wiping out my files in attempt to clean up my pc and speed it up not knowing i didn’t have the desktop file “vps info” i had copied out of the email you guys sent me with all the vps info.

Email is techaneena69@yahoo.com

Please, help ALSO!!!

MAYBE you guys can help me half the time i can’t even connect to the vps…
Daily the server disconnects (whichs kicks all my players on my game offline = loose items = refund ON DONATIONS)
this is a on-going issue, all im running is a java.exe process.
Please help…
I feel like i got involved with a shitty vps here.[/code]

Andrew V (NLVL STAFF) Replied:

[code]Gabriel,

Your VPS is a bronze VPS with only 512MB RAM with CPU limitations, we highly suggest that you upgrade. Also I will have to escalate this ticket to technical staff for them to get your VNC details

Thanks,

Andrew V
Chief Marketing Officer & General Support[/code]

[i][b]ALL he told me there was some details about my vps plan, and suggested that i should upgrade, he than followed up by saying"I will escelate this ticket to get your VNC (VPS Connect) Details.

I replied with 2 more tickets:

First Ticket Submit:[/b][/i]

Do you know how long this is going to take, at the moment i have alot of players attempting to connect. Once my password is back ill go in and remove my services with you guys stop the funds, and than upgrade. I now understand the lagg i had a computer our in spanaway with about 512mb ram i didn't know that i will upgrade soon! In the meantime i need mah password.

Second Ticket Submit:

Still waiting for a reply, ill submit more tickets, i don't think this should take more than a day to lookup my password. Very urgent people are now leaving, asking about refunds. Please bump this and give me my VPS viewer connect password as soon as possible.

Simply implying that I WILL upgrade my vps if needed.
And please return me my password.
(long story short i lost it on my hard drive during a cleanup)

Their next reply to my password request was:
(Now… where in my speaches did i ask “please re-install my vps operating system?”)

[code]Gabriel,

Your VPS is currently being re-installed, I will have your account information emailed out to you within 30 mins - 1 hour.

Thanks,

Andrew V
Chief Marketing Officer & General Support[/code]

My reply to that was:

If i loose my files in the transition or what ever it is you're doing. I'm going to be pissed guys seriously, i don't know if it even involves than but im just mentioning it.

(NONE OF THIS IS EDITED ALL I DID WAS SIMPLY SPACE OUT THE MESSAGES AND REMOVE MY PERSONAL INFO)
(sorry for the link tried submitting it on the post said a max of 2k characters…)
http://elitedemons.org/nlvlchatscript.php

Please read all this and tell me who is right in this situation, everywhere i’m seeing nlvl is good, now im doing negative research ad finding out that they’re not as professional as they appear, things don’t work on their website, they respond totally off topic with out the info you asked for, all they do is copy and paste you their t.o.s
Please read.

Read full topic
